title: Calories in a Mini Twix
meta_description: Discover calories in a mini twix, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, fat, protein, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard Mars Mini Twix bar (~6 g), milk chocolate-covered caramel and cookie, no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact size, and manufacturing; check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A single mini Twix bar contains about 25 kcal and 1.2 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a mini twix?
faqs.a: Approximately 25 kcal per mini Twix bar.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a mini twix?
faqs.a: About 3.5 g carbs, including 2.2 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a mini twix high in fat?
faqs.a: It has 1.2 g total fat, mostly saturated at 0.7 g.

faqs.q: How much protein in a mini twix?
faqs.a: Only 0.3 g protein per mini bar.

faqs.q: Does mini twix have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat in a standard mini Twix.
